content.rendered:
Directed by Julius Avery.

Written by Michael Petroni. Evan Spiliotopoulos. R. Dean McCreary.

Cast Russell Crowe. Daniel Zovatto. Alex Essoe.

Languages English. Italian. Spanish. Latin. German.

Producer Doug Belgrad. Sophie Cassidy. Jo Homewood. Michael Patrick Kaczmarek. Jeff Katz. Macdara Kelleher. Eddie Siebert.

Production Screen Gems. 2.0 Entertainment. Loyola Productions.
